response.overview: Shanju was abducted by human traffickers and bought into the mountains. When he escaped, he met old man Zhongby chance. Old man Zhong brought Shanju home, and his son Shi Gemistakenly thought that Shan Ju was the daughter-in-law his father bought for him, who knew that Shan Ju, with a strong personality, would rather die with poison than get close to him. The misunderstanding was resolved, and Mr. Zhong's family took good care of Shan Ju who was ill in bed, and then contacted Shan Ju's family to pick her up.
response.title: 嫁给大山的女人
